Bulletproof 托管商因推广 Urfsnif、Zeus 恶意软件而获刑 3 年https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/bulletproof-hoster-gets-3-years-for-pushing-urfsnif-zeus-malware/ Tue, 13 Jun 2023 10:52:14 -0400比尔图拉斯SecurityLegal https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/bulletproof-hoster-gets-3-years-for-pushing-urfsnif-zeus-malware/ Romanian national Mihai Ionut Paunescu, aka "Virus," was sentenced to three years in prison by a Manhattan federal court for running a bulletproof hosting service and facilitating the distribution of the Gozi (Ursnif), Zeus, SpyEye, and BlackEnergy malware.
